{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-07-29T20:57:13.000Z", "description": "

Computer Vision/Machine Learning Engineer (100% REMOTE)

 

Required:

  • Experience with Python focusing on image and video processing.
  • Working with public/private large-scale data sets of image/video
  • At least 1-2 year of deep learning (academy or industry) experience with TensorFlow.
  • Graduate degree on CS, CE or EE.
  • Research experience on computer vision or machine learning.

 

Desired:

  • Experience with AI on chip is a plus.
